ygData.subject: Re: opt files
ygData.msgSnippet: Yes I too found that out, had to put back my friends list and reset my gama but thats was all really for me I don t mess with hot keys too much.  So bewarned
ygData.messageBody:
Yes I too found that out, had to put back my friends list and reset my gama
but thats was all really for me I don't mess with hot keys too much. So
bewarned if you delete your *.opt files you'll have to re-do all that stuff,
but you don't have to delete them if you're not disconnecting all the time
while zoning or camping.

**************************
Azor
Lvl 18 Human Cleric of the Rathe
**************************

> From: "Curtis Bennett" <die_kluge@...>
>
> I zoned out of north ro into east commons and my machine locked up
> hard last night. Had to reset. I removed all my .opt files (there
> were 3 of them [ more if you have more characters]) and one of them
> was for all my configuration. So when I went into the game, my
> resolution was back at 640x480 and my friends list was gone, and all
> my hot-keys were undefined.
>
> >
> >From: "Azor" <jmaynus@...>
> >
> >For those that didn't see the banner on EQ today, they said if you keep
> >getting disconnected while zoning or camping to deleted your *.opt files
in
> >your EQ dir.
> >
> >**************************
> >Azor
> >Lvl 18 Human Cleric of the Rathe
> >**************************
